description: Randomization infrastructure to prevent probe fingerprinting via seeded RNG, target shuffling, jitter, and packet variability.
steps: Initialize per-process CSPRNG seeded from the OS and derive per-scan nonces
Randomize target ordering, worker assignment, and inter-probe delays with configurable bounds
Vary source ports, payload sequences, and backoff windows within policy limits
Log randomness seeds for reproducibility while never persisting them across restarts
Add property-based tests verifying distribution differences between runs
acceptance_criteria: Randomization seeds differ per restart yet maintain coverage
Timing distributions shuffle between consecutive runs without duplicating sequences
Operators can tune randomness parameters via config
